snippet: Ramiro A. Fernández explores pre-Castro Cuba in his new book of photographs he collected from that era.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; book Cuba Then: Rare and Classic Images From the Ramiro A Fernandez Collection, compiled by photography collector Fernandez, explores pre-Castro Cuba; visitors center set to open at Eldridge Street Synagogue will display artifacts from lives of its original 19th-century members; exhibit Hapsburg Splendor: Masterpieces From Vienna's Imperial Collection will begin American tour in February 2015.
lead_paragraph: Ramiro A. Fernández explores pre-Castro Cuba in his new book of photographs he collected from that era.

headline.main: Looking Back at Cuba and the Lower East Side
headline.print_headline: Dreams of Havana Past, Seen in Black and White
